product_description: Three-section cups with reinforced side panels offer great support and rounded shape for this full-fit underwire bra.
product_details_and_care:
Three-section cups with reinforced side panels offer great support and rounded shape for this full-fit underwire bra. The fan-shaped embroidery sits flat for minimal show through clothing, while fabric is lowered under the arm for increased comfort throughout your day.
55% polyester, 37% nylon, 8% elastane
Hand wash, line dry
Imported
Lingerie
Item #6070640
